# Svtter's Blog

> 在你想要放弃的时候，想想你为什么开始

## About

This is a technical blog maintained by Svtter, covering topics in software development, DevOps practices, and machine learning.

The blog is built with Hugo and the Stack theme, featuring articles on:
- Python programming and best practices
- DevOps tools and workflows (Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD)
- Machine learning concepts and implementations
- Software engineering thoughts and methodologies

## Recent Posts

- [Running Claude Code in a VM for Automated Testing and Development](https://svtter.cn/en/p/running-claude-code-in-a-vm-for-automated-testing-and-development/): Recently, I verified an effective AI development method that doesn&rsquo;t affect the existing workflow. Here&rsquo;s a summary.

- [Developing Fried Rice Theme with Claude Code](https://svtter.cn/en/p/developing-fried-rice-theme-with-claude-code/): Recording the experience of developing Hugo blog theme with Claude Code
- [CS146S is a Good Course](https://svtter.cn/en/p/cs146s-is-a-good-course/): CS146S is a good course, one of the reasons is that it teaches modern software engineers how to better collaborate with AI. Secondly, it basically …
- [Use Emerging Open Source Software with Caution](https://svtter.cn/en/p/use-emerging-open-source-software-with-caution/): Open source software can become the Achilles' heel of servers
- [Third-party Client Performance](https://svtter.cn/en/p/third-party-client-performance/): Can we directly use third-party clients with open-source models to replace the official web services of large models?
- [Can GLM 4.6 Be Strengthened Through Spec-Kit](https://svtter.cn/en/p/can-glm-4.6-be-strengthened-through-spec-kit/): How can weaker models be leveraged to achieve stronger performance?
- [Claude Code Plugin Usage Experience](https://svtter.cn/en/p/claude-code-plugin-usage-experience/): A simple description
- [[Expired] I now use GLM 4.6 more often.](https://svtter.cn/en/p/expired-i-now-use-glm-4.6-more-often./): Comparing the Experience Differences Between GLM 4.6 and DeepSeek v3.2 in Practical Use
- [Several Issues with Zhipu GLM-4.5 in Programming](https://svtter.cn/en/p/several-issues-with-zhipu-glm-4.5-in-programming/): Through some leaderboards and the report, I saw that glm-4.5 received high scores, so I gritted my teeth and subscribed to the annual coding plan. …
- [How to Use Claude Code With Deepseek](https://svtter.cn/en/p/how-to-use-claude-code-with-deepseek/): How to Use Claude Code via DeepSeek API
- [Poor Performance of Large Models on Specific Tasks](https://svtter.cn/en/p/poor-performance-of-large-models-on-specific-tasks/): Poor performance of large models on specific tasks: Differences from visual recognition to formatted text processing
- [Using uv to publish Python packages](https://svtter.cn/en/p/using-uv-to-publish-python-packages/): Publishing uv packages
- [2025 Q1 Summary](https://svtter.cn/en/p/2025-q1-summary/): Summary for the First Quarter of 2025
- [Deployment of Dify 1.2.0](https://svtter.cn/en/p/deployment-of-dify-1.2.0/): dify is an AI agent tool.
- [Work With Langfuse](https://svtter.cn/en/p/work-with-langfuse/): Using langfuse to monitor LLM applications
- [Draw Subfig and Making Subplot](https://svtter.cn/en/p/draw-subfig-and-making-subplot/): Draw subplots to batch browse images
- [Diffusion Model](https://svtter.cn/en/p/diffusion-model/): Diffusion models are the foundation of all image generation models.
- [Using uv](https://svtter.cn/en/p/using-uv/): uv is a tool for python package management.
- [A Docker Image for Computer Vision](https://svtter.cn/en/p/a-docker-image-for-computer-vision/): A Docker image built for visual computing
